p: The TISM approach has been applied over the years, has found use in a diverse stream of applications for analysing inter-relationships among factors [ [128], [129], [130]], but until now it has not been used to investigate causative factors of emergence and re-emergence of epidemics and pandemics. The research tool TISM was used to obtain insights into the interrelationships among factors that trigger frequencies of emerging infectious diseases and their increased spreading from epidemics to pandemics.
